OrgName.entry: PHYSICAL ACTIVITY REFERRAL SCHEME - SHEFFIELD CITY COUNCIL ACTIVITY SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: The scheme is open to anyone who has been referred by a GP or other health professional for health conditions which benefit from more physical activity, such as high blood pressure, arthritis, depression, bone/joint problems, asthma and many more. Provides a one-to-one consultation and offers advice and support on becoming more active. Classes are specifically designed for referral patients and include swimming and gym programmes. After an initial 12 week period, a range of packages are available to enable people to continue gaining the benefits of exercise and activity. Held at various sports and leisure centres around the city.
